content: कूब(व)र {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (री|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) {@--1@} Beautiful, agreeable. {@--2@} Hump-backed. --रः, --रं The pole of a carriage to which the yoke is fixed. --रः A hump-backed man. --री {@--1@} A carriage covered with a cloth or blanket. {@--2@} The pole of a carriage to which the yoke is fixed; <ls>Ve. 4.</ls>
